analytic.author: Bahr, Hermann
analytic.title: A Letter from Germany. Munich: October, 1928

biblStruct.note: The Editor of The London Mercury has very flatteringly reproached me for letting my news of German literature get rarer and rarer, till it almost ceases completely.
Hermann Bahr: A Letter from Germany. Munich: October, 1928. In: The London Mercury, Jg. 19, Nr. 110, December 1928, S. 191–193.

event.label: Wiener Uraufführung Der Abenteurer und die Sängerin und Die Hochzeit der Sobeide, 18.3.1899
